content: this stylish and graceful half-dome style hat is worked in the round bottom up with its gentle and flattering garter stitch brim and its delicate bias body this hat has plenty of style and stretch the pattern is provided in written format and in 3 sizes ranging from 12 months through to adults **yarn** 88 116 147 yd/74 107 136 m 35yd/32m for a 6x6in/15x15cm swatch in st st dk weight plied yarn **needles & notions** set 4mm/uk8/us6 dpns/circular or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker as necessary tapestry needle **sample details** shown in the little knitting company tebe extra fine merino dk 153yd/140m per 50g 100% merino shown in size 23in/58 5cm on model with 21 75in/55 25cm circumference head **alternative yarn** debbie bliss rialto dk 115yd/105m per 50g 100% merino **gauge** 21 sts x 28 row to 4in/10cm on 4mm needles over st st 20 sts x 40 row to 4in/10cm on 4mm needles over garter st **sizes** to fit size 18 20 23 in/ 45 75 51 58 5 cm finished size 14 5 16 75 19 25 in/ 36 75 42 5 49 cm **skills required** knit & purl sts knitting in the round increases & decreases provisional cast-on joining live sts **accessibility statement** the main pdf for this pattern is colour blind accessible it uses black text on a white background **support** do you need help with this pattern we have a specific discussion thread 1 in the wormhead s hats group where you can ask any questions published april 2011 technical editor heather murray 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/woolly-wormheads-hats/topics/1642707
